TopicTitle: This is my favorite Minecraft video. It mentions Kerbal Space Program.

Articles.Content:
Here is the video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=stBW9byJQY4

 

And this si where KSP affects Minecraft players
And this si where KSP affects Minecraft player

It's very dangerous to combine KSP and MC, because creepers look so close to Kerbals.

Are you even sure that Kerbals are not their relatives? They are green, cylindrical, and like bursts.

Zombies....
Instead of constantly suggested animals, we can send Kerbal zombies.

They are not Kerbals or animals, they perfectly fit the Kerbal seats, they are green and don't need air and food oops...,  and this finally gives a purpose for Dres.

"Gather all zombies around KSC and deliver them to the Canyon of Dres for living existing."

Every night zombies and creepers may be spawned in dark places of Kerbin and other celestial bodies.
Put torches everywhere if you don't want this. Get a torched Mun.

Pack the creepers into SRB, and send zombies away. Catch them on other planets to study.
Make superthin space elevator out of webs.

Ghasts can be packed as airship balloons. Just pack them with faces inside.
Slimes are useful to store water and organics in cargo bays.

Ocelots are a must-have themselves.
